properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bm
"Set apart" -- a chosen vessel
To the King of kings
"Set apart" -- forever severed
From all earthly things

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chosen vessels, empty, weak and small
Bearing heaven's greatest treasure
Christ the Lord of all
Christ the Lord of all

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
"Set apart" --
to bear the fragrance
Of His blessed Name
And with Him
to share the sufferings
Of a cross of shame

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
"Set apart" --
with Him to suffer
O'er a world undone
And to stand
in fiercest conflict
Till the fight be won

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
"Set apart" --
an earthern vessel
Empty - weak and small
Yet the treasure
that it beareth
Christ the Lord of all
